title: 【D站转载】Mc moar Loki
author: JedBoy_LD
txt_content:
本帖最后由 JedBoy_LD 于 2012-7-26 21:15 编辑 

Mc moar Loki
转载出处：http://sonicblaze101.deviantart. ... 0max_age%3A8h&qo=54





mc_moar_loki_by_sonicblaze101-d58r98v.png (167.05 KB, 下载次数: 17)

下载附件

2012-7-26 20:41 上传





My gooooooooooood, it's doneeeeeeeeeeeeee.
Freaking finally. It took hours to make over a day, and there are countless mistakes. There were many times where I wanted to give up, but I forced myself to carry on.

Still, I am proud, and glad I finished ._.

Original picture here -> [link]

Btw, who here does have minecraft? If you do, you should join on on this epic server us6-public.minez.net
if so, you shhould so join and so wear Loki skins with me try to survive with me. If you're interested just note :U

If this description fails like arse, please note I am typing this at 5:46am as the weather here, in the south east of England is a pile of shit as it's way too hot and I couldn't sleep well at all.
翻译：我的作品，但这不是完成品。

总算结束了。费了一天左右的时间，很多漏洞。有很多次我想放弃，但是我还是咬牙坚持了下来。

还有，我很自豪，很开心我做完了。_。

原始图片在这里- > [链接]

顺便说一句，这里谁是MineCraft爱好者？如果你是，你应该了加入这个非常著名的服务器：us6-public.minez.net

如果是这样的话，你应该和我穿着Loki的皮肤在里面一起生存，当然如果你愿意的话:U

如果你说这是一段被烂尾的文字说明，请注意我是在5:46am恶劣的天气里敲键盘的，在英格兰的东南部天气热的要死，我这个时候根本都睡不着……
